item.title: NTR - The Cult of Noah and More on Repentance
item.description: I talk about a developing theory of interpreting mythologies around the world. As well as more on several types of biblical repentance.
item.dc:creator: Chris White
item.itunes:summary: I talk about a developing theory of interpreting mythologies around the world. As well as more on several types of biblical repentance.

item.title: NTR - Discipleship Session 1
item.description: This is the 1st talk on discipleship I will be giving at the Kenya pastors conference in June 2012. It talks about the seriousness that Jesus places on the act of following Him, and it focuses on the importance of the understanding and teaching the Word of God in discipleship, as well as giving many practical ideas for discipleship.

item.description: I talk about The upcoming Ancient Aliens debunking project, they dynamics of the Christian / Conspiracy worldview, and the danger of deception in general. I also talk about several other random issues.

item.title: NTR - Sin and The Secret of Being Full
item.description:
First I talk about the new Christianity 101 torrent and Elliot Nesch's New Film The Real Roots of the Emergent Church youtube.com/watch?v=UfLjAh-mWso
Then I talk about sin issues and some thoughts on repentance and victory. Then I mention and discuss Philippians 4, and the idea of knowing the secret of abounding and being abased.
Show Notes: New Christianity 101 DVD Torrent New Frank and Chris Show Torrent

item.title: NTR - Disaster Relief - Curt Hencye Interview
item.description: An interview about disaster relief with Curt Hencye http://reliefministriesccsarasota.com Email: DisasterPastor@CalvaryRelief.com Mailing List: http://eepurl.com/d5tP About Relief Ministries: We've been called by the Lord to be missionaries. Our mission field is wherever a disaster strikes. We respond to an area that has suffered a disaster, helping those affected get back on their feet as we share the love of Jesus with them! While serving we remember that discipleship in the Lord is the most important thing!
item.dc:creator: Chris White
item.itunes:summary: An interview about disaster relief with Curt Hencye http://reliefministriesccsarasota.com Email: DisasterPastor@CalvaryRelief.com Mailing List: http://eepurl.com/d5tP About Relief Ministries: We've been called by the Lord to be missionaries. item.title: NTR - Hell, Discipleship, and Dying Well
item.description: I talk more about the doctrine of hell. I thin the reason why there is so much confusion is because bible teachers often dont teach the long version of the doctrine. I also talk about discipleship and dying well. I conclude with some thoughts on the upcoming trip to Kenya.

item.itunes:summary: I talk more about the doctrine of hell. I thin the reason why there is so much confusion is because bible teachers often dont teach the long version of the doctrine. I also talk about discipleship and dying well. I conclude with some thoughts on the upcoming trip to Kenya.

item.title: NTR - Going to Africa
item.description: Ill be going to Kenya this summer, probably for a little over two months. I will be speaking to up to 400 pastors from Kenya, Uganda and Rwanda about evangelism, discipleship and leadership. There are many projects I hope to complete while there. There is such a lack of materials for them, I have many ideas of how best to bless them. Please pray for the preparation and equipping from the Lord.

There is such a lack of materials for them, I have many ideas of how best to bless them. Please pray for the preparation and equipping from the Lord.

item.title: NTR - Answers to Common Questions 1
item.description:
Was Moses akhenaten? Did Jesus go to India? John Todd? What about the phoenix lights and spacecraft? Indigo children? can good spirits be contacted or channeled? Is the mark of the beast a chip? Can we be tricked into getting it? Is David Icke a freemason or some kind of agent? What about the 26,000 precession cycle? What to do if I am dealing with demons?

item.title: NTR - Ipods are Cool and Gog Magog Fever
item.description:
The first NTR show in some time. I talk about the awesome opportunity we have with mp3 players and my new method for meditating on scripture. I then rant about some issues on my mind with the "Gog Magog" war and why I dont see any reason to expect it to happen before Revelation 20:7-8
Show notes: A FRESH LOOK AT EZEKIEL 38 AND 39 http://www.etsjets.org/files/JETS-PDFs/17/17-3/17-3-pp157-169_JETS.pdf
Notice the Chronological pattern of these prophetic books they all end just as The Revelation does with the pattern of:
DOTL,1000 years, Gog Magog, and the Eternal Kingdom.
I believe that Ezekiel also ends this way too, but the last 9 chapters (about the 1000 years) were perhaps intended to be circulated separately, which may make sense of Josephus' idea that Ezekiel left behind "two books" (Ant. 10.5, 1) Either way its clear that Eze 37-39 ends just as the other books do, with this same chronology.
Premillennial Judgment Passages (DOTL) (give or take)
Rev: 6:12 - 19:21 Zeph 1-2:5 Eze 37:1-11 Zec: 14: 1-5
1000 Year Period
Rev 20:1-6 Zeph 2:6-15 Joel 2:21-32 Isa: 65:17-25, 66:10-14 Eze 37: 12-28 Zec 14: 6-11
Gog Magog
Rev 20:7-9 Zeph 3:1-11 Joel 3:1-16 Isa 66:15-18 Eze 38-39:20 Zec 12:1-9, 14:12-15
Eternal Kingdom
Zeph 3:12-20 Joel 3:17 -21 Isa 66:19-24 Rev 21:1-22:5 Eze 39:21-29 Zec 12:10-14, 14: 16-21
I am sure that I may be off on some of the above, but I think its pretty close. Also I would recommend this paper which although does not make any of the above claims it did make me see as never before the importance of the Ezekiel 40-48 in relation to Zechariah: ZECHARIAH IN RELATION TO. EZEKIEL 40-48 by CAMERON MAkay http://www.biblicalstudies.org.uk/pdf/eq/1968-4_197.pdf.

item.title: NTR - Trumpet Mania -The Rapture will NOT be on Rosh Hashana - Well Then What IS the "Last Trump" Referring To ?
item.description: This is a podcast debunking the idea that the Last Trump of 1 cor:15:52 and 1 Thess 4:16 are talking about Rosh Hashana or "the feast of trumpets" but instead about the silver trumpets of Numbers 10 which are connected to the Day of the Lord: Joel 2:1, Zep 1:14-16. This episode also suggests a much more biblical fulfillment of the fall feasts, not at the rapture but rather at the end of the 70th week of Daniel.
item.dc:creator: Chris White
item.itunes:summary: This is a podcast debunking the idea that the Last Trump of 1 cor:15:52 and 1 Thess 4:16 are talking about Rosh Hashana or "the feast of trumpets" but instead about the silver trumpets of Numbers 10 which are connected to the Day of the Lord: Joel 2:1, Zep 1:14-16. This episode also suggests a much more biblical fulfillment of the fall feasts, not at the rapture but rather at the end of the 70th week of Daniel.

item.title: NTR - A Critical Look at Quantum Mysticism , Elenin, and Nephilim in Bible Prophecy
item.description:
The title says it all.
Show notes:
Wave Particle Duality http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wave%E2%80%93particle_duality
Elenin Links: Comet Elenin is NOT a satellite of a Brown Dwarf Star http://astroblogger.blogspot.com/2011/06/comet-elenin-is-not-satellite-of-brown.html Revisiting Comet 2010 X1 Elenin, Earthquakes, Astronomical Alignments and Mensur Omerbashich From Super Moons to Comet Elenin – we will NOT get killer earthquakes from the sky http://astroblogger.blogspot.com/2011/07/revisiting-comet-2010-x1-elenin.html http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brown_dwarf http://www.2012hoax.org/elenin Mensur Omerbashich - RationalWiki http://rationalwiki.org/wiki/Mensur_Omerbashich Comet Elenin Cause Of Earthquakes? http://www.bautforum.com/showthread.php/113532-Comet-Elenin-Cause-Of-Earthquakes?p=1862470#post1862470 http://www.bautforum.com/showthread.php/115663-Comet-Elenin-Confirmed-to-be-causing-Earthquakes?p=1889784#post1889784 What happens if we replace comet Elenin with a brown dwarf? (a model) By SpaceObs.org http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_S4T0wqrSzA&feature=player_embedded
No Nephilim in Bible Prophecy: No Nephilim in Bible Prophecy Part 2 – Dan 2:43 (the one I read on air) http://stopalienabduction.com/nephilimhybrids/wordpress/?page_id=43 No Nephilim in Bible Prophecy Part 1 – Matthew 24 http://stopalienabduction.com/nephilimhybrids/wordpress/?page_id=41 No Nephilim in Bible Prophecy Part 3 – Dan 2:43 not even if “they” were fallen angels http://stopalienabduction.com/nephilimhybrids/wordpress/?page_id=50

item.title: NTR - 07/07/11
item.description:
I talk about a ton of things, including: Time being relative and its biblical implications, Pauliantiy, Seventh Day Adventisim, Alan Watt, the KJV, I do a quick study of Proverbs 2: 1-6 and more.

item.title: NTR - 06/29/2011
item.description:
I talk about a new project "The New Age and its Relationship to the Antichrist" Sleep paralysis, 2012. verse by verse, recent plans, revisiting depression cures, understanding the gospel, JW testimonies and I play the meaty part of the testimony of Jon Courson.
Show notes: Recent 2012 blog http://the2012deception.net/?p=392 Gospel videos http://conspiracyclothes.com/nowheretorun/the-gospel/ Download entire Jon Courson Testimony http://revelationsradionetwork.com/uploads/02_LIMPING_THROUGH_LIFE.MP3

item.title: NTR - The Bible, Marriage, Trafficking and Depression
item.description:
I talk about the importance of reading the bible, and observation about marriage, I talk about sex trafficking in America, and what we can do to help. I also mention the biblical cure for depression. Also I mention and update from Victor, Daniels Testimony, and the new Christianity 101 DVDs.

item.title: NTR - Paul Flynn Interview - The Power Behind the New World Order
item.description:
Paul Flynn is a filmmaker who has just put out a very comprehensive look at the "New World Order" from a Christian perspective. This interview talks about his journey and his motivations for making what I think it one of the better movies on this issue. http://megiddofilms.org/

The Power Behind the New World Order from Megiddo Films on Vimeo.

item.title: NTR - Propaganda - An Interview with Andrew Hoffman

item.title: NTR - Lots of Stuff
item.description:
I talk about some really good music artists and play a few clips.I talk about famine and faith, The REAL subliminal messages in movies and music. and I also mention Russ Dizdar's Courses, which are now free, and talk about which ones helped me the most. Also I play a clip from my conversation with Gaz Parker who is looking foe testimonies from people that used to be in the new age for a few of his upcoming projects.
Show Notes: Gaz Parker (New Age Deception) http://newagedeception.net
Russ's Courses THEO CENTRIC COUNSELING http://www.shatterthedarkness.net/theocentric/page2.html FREEDOM ENCOUNTERs http://www.shatterthedarkness.net/freedom/page19.html CONFRONTING THE POWERS http://www.shatterthedarkness.net/3edmillennium/page2.html Dynamic Discipleship http://www.shatterthedarkness.net/dynamicdiscipleship/ SEXUAL DECADENCE AND THE END OF MAN http://www.shatterthedarkness.net/news2011/page6.html THE BOOK OF DANIEL http://www.shatterthedarkness.net/daniel/page2.html Satanisim 101 http://www.shatterthedarkness.net/satanism/page2.html HOW TO DETECT AND CONFRONT LUCIFERIC RITUAL WARFARE http://www.shatterthedarkness.net/NEWSLETTER09/page25.html The Abyss http://www.shatterthedarkness.net/abyss/page9.html SUPER NATURAL APOLOGETICS http://www.thirdmillenniumtheology.com/APOLOGETICS/page2.html Anti-Christ http://www.shatterthedarkness.net/ANTICHRIST/ ESP or HSP http://www.shatterthedarkness.net/discernment/ Donate to Russ here: http://www.shatterthedarkness.net/page34.html
